## App: Word Pred 2.0

App shows the next word predictor with updates from first form of app.
We used pentagrams, quadgrams, trigrams,bigrams, unigrams, spellcheck fucntion

## Updates

- Added quad gram and penta gram
- CSS styles to the app using css file
- Spell check using En_US dict for extra flexibility
- Dynamic buttons to give a keyboard look
- Central button for spell check
- remaining 2 buttons for top n-grams next word predictor
